# Elaren Studio

> Bright, enduring websites—built fast, kept current.

Elaren Studio is a web design studio that builds clean, fast, conversion-focused websites for local service businesses and therapy practices. We use a static-first stack (Astro, Tailwind CSS, global CDN) for speed, reliability, and longevity.

## What We Do

- **Design & Build**: Custom static websites with modern frameworks. 10-day launch window. Starting at $3,800.
- **Website-as-a-Service (WaaS)**: Lease your site with $0 down and ongoing improvements. From $175/month.
- **Landing Pages**: Campaign-ready pages that convert. From $1,000.
- **Therapist Websites**: Specialized offer for therapy practices. $500 setup + $99–$199/month care plans.

## Therapist Website Offer

Our primary vertical is therapist and therapy practice websites:

- **Website Launch**: $500 one-time (custom design, up to 5 pages, mobile optimization, SEO setup)
- **WaaS Starter**: $99/month (hosting, SSL, backups, uptime monitoring, 1 edit/month)
- **WaaS Care+**: $199/month (unlimited edits, monthly conversion tune-up, local SEO maintenance, priority support)

Launch target: ~10 days once copy and assets are provided.

We serve solo therapists, group practices, and multi-location clinics. We do not provide HIPAA legal compliance guarantees.

## Service Areas

- Dallas, TX
- Fort Worth, TX
- Houston, TX
- Nationwide (remote)

## Values

- Clarity by design
- Built to endure
- Care that scales
- Respect for your time

## Resources

Guides, teardowns, and templates for service businesses and therapy practices.

- [Resources Index](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/)
- [Wright Wellness Website Teardown: Before vs After](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/teardowns/wright-wellness-before-after-teardown/) — A real before-and-after website redesign for a mental health practice.
- [How Much Does a Website Redesign Cost in 2026?](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/guides/website-redesign-cost-2026/) — Real cost ranges, hidden costs, and payment models compared for service businesses.
- [How Long Does a Website Take in 2026?](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/guides/how-long-does-a-website-take-2026/) — Honest timelines, the seven delay killers, and how to launch in 10 days instead of 10 weeks.
- [Squarespace vs WordPress vs Webflow in 2026](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/guides/squarespace-vs-wordpress-vs-webflow-2026/) — Evidence-based platform comparison for service businesses. Real performance data, total cost of ownership, and which platform fits which business stage.
- [Keep a Static Site Fresh](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/guides/keep-a-static-site-fresh/) — Short, regular updates beat large, infrequent ones.
- [Project Brief Template](https://elarenstudio.com/resources/templates/project-brief/) — A ready-to-use project brief template for web design engagements.
